document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Llewellyn on the east coast.
document_data.name: Llewellyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Llewellyn''' was a small coastal town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Llewellyn was located along the [[High King's Road]] in southern Callidyrr in the county of [[Stirgewick]]. The town sat along the eastern coast with the [[Strait of Alaron]] on the north end of [[Llewellyn Harbor]] within [[Bregonshire]].
document_data.Description: Several hundred cottages filled the town, surrounding a few larger structures.
document_data.Inhabitants: Llewellyn was named after its Lord [[Llewellyn (person)|Llewellyn]].
document_data.Defenses: A stone tower located about a mile from the shore provided a degree of protection against raiding [[Northlander]]s.
